sqlMap.select: SELECT api_id APIID,api_name APINAME FROM api WHERE service_id IN ( SELECT service_id FROM service_product_real WHERE product_id = #productId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId# ) and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT api_id APIID,api_name APINAME FROM api WHERE service_id IN ( SELECT service_id FROM service_product_real WHERE product_id in (SELECT product_id FROM offer_prod_rel WHERE prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId#) and TENANT_ID=#tenantId# ) and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
SELECT b.* FROM offer_prod_rel a,product b WHERE a.product_id = b.product_id and a.prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId# and a.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and b.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT AA.*, ifnull(BB.PAGE_VIEW,0) PAGE_VIEW, ifnull(BB.COLLECT_CNT,0) COLLECT_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.*,C.DIR_NAME FROM PROD_OFFER A LEFT JOIN offer_catalog_location B ON A.prod_offer_id = B.prod_offer_id and b.tenant_id = #tenantId# LEFT JOIN directory C on b.dir_id = c.dir_id and c.tenant_id = #tenantId# and c.dir_state='A' and c.dir_type='3' WHERE A.prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId# AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE = '11' AND A.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND A.exp_date >= NOW() ) AA LEFT JOIN ITEM_CNT BB ON AA.PROD_OFFER_ID = BB.item_code AND BB.tenant_id = #tenantId# and BB.item_type=2
SELECT api_id APIID,api_name APINAME FROM api WHERE service_id = #serviceId# and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT DIR_ID DIRID,FA_DIR_ID FADIRID,DIR_NAME DIRNAME FROM directory D WHERE D.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND D.DIR_TYPE = 2 AND D.FA_DIR_ID = 100 AND D.DIR_ID IN
#DirId[]#
and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT DIR_ID DIRID,FA_DIR_ID FADIRID,DIR_NAME DIRNAME,DIR_TYPE DIRTYPE FROM directory D WHERE D.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND (D.DIR_TYPE = 2 or D.DIR_ID=401) AND D.FA_DIR_ID IN
#DirId[]#
and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
SELECT DIR_ID DIRID,FA_DIR_ID FADIRID,DIR_NAME DIRNAME,DIR_TYPE DIRTYPE FROM directory D WHERE D.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND D.DIR_ID=401 and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT DIR_ID DIRID,FA_DIR_ID FADIRID,DIR_NAME DIRNAME,DIR_TYPE DIRTYPE FROM directory D WHERE D.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND D.DIR_TYPE = 0 AND D.FA_DIR_ID IN
#DirId[]#
and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
SELECT DIR_NAME DIRNAME FROM directory D WHERE D.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND D.DIR_TYPE = 2 AND D.DIR_ID=#dirId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT A.DIR_ID DIRID,B.QUE_HELP_ID HELPID,B.QUE_TITLE QUETITLE,B.QUE_ASK_CONTENT QUEASKCONTENT,C.DIR_TYPE DIRTYPE FROM que_he_dir_list A,ques_help B, directory C WHERE A.QUE_HE_DIR_ID = B.QUE_HELP_ID AND B.QUE_AUDIT_STATE='A' AND A.DIR_ID=C.DIR_ID AND A.DIR_ID=#dirId# and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT A.API_ID APIID,A.API_NAME APINAME,A.API_METHOD APIMETHOD,D.DIR_NAME DIRNAME FROM api A,service B,dir_ser_list C,directory D WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID=C.SERVICE_ID AND C.DIR_ID=D.DIR_ID AND (A.API_NAME like concat('%',#id#,'%') or A.API_METHOD like concat('%',#id#,'%')) and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT count(1) FROM api A,service B,dir_ser_list C,directory D WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID=C.SERVICE_ID AND C.DIR_ID=D.DIR_ID AND C.DIR_ID IN
#DirId[]#
(A.API_NAME LIKE concat('%',#searchValue#,'%') OR A.API_METHOD LIKE concat('%',#searchValue#,'%') OR D.DIR_NAME LIKE concat('%',#searchValue#,'%'))
and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT A.API_ID APIID, A.API_NAME APINAME, A.API_METHOD APIMETHOD,D.DIR_NAME DIRNAME FROM api A,service B,dir_ser_list C,directory D WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID=C.SERVICE_ID AND C.DIR_ID=D.DIR_ID AND C.DIR_ID IN
#DirId[]#
(A.API_NAME LIKE concat('%',#searchValue#,'%') OR A.API_METHOD LIKE concat('%',#searchValue#,'%') OR D.DIR_NAME LIKE concat('%',#searchValue#,'%'))
and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# limit #pro_mysql#,#page_record#

SELECT A.API_ID APIID,A.API_NAME APINAME,A.API_METHOD APIMETHOD,D.DIR_NAME DIRNAME FROM api A,service B,dir_ser_list C,directory D WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID=C.SERVICE_ID AND C.DIR_ID=D.DIR_ID AND D.DIR_ID=#id# and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT A.DIR_ID DIRID, A.DIR_NAME DIRNAME, A.FA_DIR_ID FADIRID, B.S_FILE_ID SFILEID FROM directory A,file_share B WHERE A.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND A.DIR_TYPE = 0 AND A.S_FILE_ID = B.S_FILE_ID and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT A.API_ID APIID,A.API_NAME APINAME,A.API_METHOD APIMETHOD,D.DIR_ID DIRID,D.DIR_NAME DIRNAME FROM api A,service B,dir_ser_list C,directory D WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND B.SERVICE_ID=C.SERVICE_ID AND C.DIR_ID=D.DIR_ID AND A.API_ID=#value# and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
SELECT S.SERVICE_DESC SERVICEDESC FROM api A,service S WHERE A.API_ID=#value# and A.service_id=S.service_id and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
SELECT A.IS_NEED_USER_AUTH USERAUTH FROM api A WHERE A.API_ID=#value# and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

select ttt.attr_spec_value ATTRSPECVALUE from api a, service b, tech_impl c, component d, (select tt.tech_impl_id tech_impl_id, aaa.service_id service_id, aaa.create_time create_time, group_concat(tt.attr_spec_value) attr_spec_value, aaa.ser_tech_impl_id ser_tech_impl_id from tech_imp_att tt,ser_tech_impl aaa where tt.tech_impl_id = aaa.tech_impl_id and tt.attr_spec_id=1 and aaa.tenant_id=#tenantId# and tt.tenant_id=#tenantId# group by tech_impl_id) ttt where ttt.service_id = b.service_id and ttt.tech_impl_id = c.tech_impl_id and c.component_id = d.component_id and a.service_id=b.service_id and a.api_id=#value# and a.tenant_id=#tenantId# and b.tenant_id=#tenantId# and c.tenant_id=#tenantId# and d.tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT distinct E.COMM_PRO_NAME COMMPRONAME,E.COMM_PRO_CD COMMPROCD FROM api A,service B,ser_tech_impl C,tech_impl D,comm_protocal E,component F WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND C.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND D.TECH_IMPL_ID=C.TECH_IMPL_ID AND E.COMM_PRO_CD = D.COMM_PRO_CD AND A.API_ID=#value# AND F.COMPONENT_ID=D.COMPONENT_ID and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and F.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT E.CEP_NAME CEPNAME FROM api A,service B,contract_version C,contract_format D, main_data E, main_data_type F WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND D.REQ_RSP='REQ' AND D.CON_TYPE = E.CEP_CODE AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = D.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND F.MDT_SIGN = 'type_contract' AND F.MDT_CD = E.MDT_CD AND E.CEP_CODE= D.CON_TYPE AND A.API_ID=#value# and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and E.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and F.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT F.NONENAME, F.FNONENAME, F.NODEPATH, E.MAIND_ID MAINDID, E.CEP_NAME NODETYPE, G.CEP_NAME ISNOT, F.NEVL_CONS_VALUE, F.DESCRIPTION, F.PARENT_NODE_NAME, B.SERVICE_CODE from api A left join service B on A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID left join contract_version C on C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID left join contract_format D on C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = D.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID left join (SELECT m.NODE_DESC_ID,m.node_name NONENAME,n.node_name FNONENAME,m.node_path NODEPATH,m.TCP_CTR_F_ID,m.NEVL_CONS_VALUE,m.DESCRIPTION,m.NODE_TYPE_CONS,m.NODE_NUMBER_CONS,m.STATE,m.PARENT_NODE_NAME,m.NODE_TYPE FROM node_desc m LEFT JOIN node_desc n ON m.parent_node_id = n.node_desc_id and m.tenant_id=#tenantId#) F on F.TCP_CTR_F_ID = D.TCP_CTR_F_ID left join main_data E on F.NODE_TYPE_CONS =E.CEP_CODE AND E.MDT_CD='303' left join main_data G on G.CEP_CODE=F.NODE_NUMBER_CONS AND G.MDT_CD='301' where D.REQ_RSP='REQ' AND F.STATE = 'A' AND A.API_ID=#value# and A.tenant_id=#tenantId# and B.tenant_id=#tenantId# and C.tenant_id=#tenantId# and D.tenant_id=#tenantId# and E.tenant_id=#tenantId# and G.tenant_id=#tenantId# AND F.node_type = '1' ORDER BY F.NODE_DESC_ID

SELECT F.NONENAME, F.FNONENAME, F.NODEPATH, E.MAIND_ID MAINDID, E.CEP_NAME NODETYPE, G.CEP_NAME ISNOT, F.NEVL_CONS_VALUE, F.DESCRIPTION, F.PARENT_NODE_NAME from api A left join service B on A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID left join contract_version C on C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID left join contract_format D on C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = D.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID left join (SELECT m.NODE_DESC_ID,m.node_name NONENAME,n.node_name FNONENAME,m.node_path NODEPATH,m.TCP_CTR_F_ID,m.NEVL_CONS_VALUE,m.DESCRIPTION,m.NODE_TYPE_CONS,m.NODE_NUMBER_CONS,m.STATE,m.PARENT_NODE_NAME,m.NODE_TYPE FROM node_desc m LEFT JOIN node_desc n ON m.parent_node_id = n.node_desc_id and m.tenant_id=#tenantId#) F on F.TCP_CTR_F_ID = D.TCP_CTR_F_ID left join main_data E on F.NODE_TYPE_CONS =E.CEP_CODE AND E.MDT_CD='303' left join main_data G on G.CEP_CODE=F.NODE_NUMBER_CONS AND G.MDT_CD='301' where D.REQ_RSP='REQ' AND F.STATE = 'A' AND A.API_ID=#value# and A.tenant_id=#tenantId# and B.tenant_id=#tenantId# and C.tenant_id=#tenantId# and D.tenant_id=#tenantId# and E.tenant_id=#tenantId# and G.tenant_id=#tenantId# AND F.node_type = '2' ORDER BY F.NODE_DESC_ID

SELECT D.XSD_DEMO REQINSTANCE FROM api A,service B,contract_version C,contract_format D WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = D.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND A.API_ID=#value# AND D.REQ_RSP='REQ' and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT F.XSD_DEMO REQINSTANCE FROM api A,service B,contract_version C,contract_format D,service_product_real E,prod_xsd_demo F WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = D.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND E.PRODUCT_ID = #value# AND D.REQ_RSP='REQ' AND B.service_id = E.SERVICE_ID AND E.PRODUCT_ID = F.PRODUCT_ID AND D.TCP_CTR_F_ID = F.TCP_CTR_F_ID and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and F.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT F.NODE_PATH NODEPATH,F.NODE_NAME NONENAME, F.PARENT_NODE_NAME FANONENAME, E.MAIND_ID MAINDID,E.CEP_NAME NODETYPE,G.CEP_NAME ISNOT, F.NEVL_CONS_VALUE, F.DESCRIPTION, F.PARENT_NODE_NAME from api A left join service B on A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID left join contract_version C on C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID left join contract_format D on C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = D.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID left join node_desc F on F.TCP_CTR_F_ID = D.TCP_CTR_F_ID AND F.STATE = 'A' left join main_data E on F.NODE_TYPE_CONS =E.CEP_CODE AND E.MDT_CD='303' left join main_data G on G.CEP_CODE=F.NODE_NUMBER_CONS AND G.MDT_CD='301' where D.REQ_RSP='RSP' AND A.API_ID=#value# and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and E.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and F.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and G.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND F.node_type = '1' ORDER BY F.NODE_DESC_ID

SELECT F.NODE_PATH NODEPATH,F.NODE_NAME NONENAME, E.MAIND_ID MAINDID,E.CEP_NAME NODETYPE,G.CEP_NAME ISNOT, F.NEVL_CONS_VALUE, F.DESCRIPTION, F.PARENT_NODE_NAME from api A left join service B on A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID left join contract_version C on C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID left join contract_format D on C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = D.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID left join node_desc F on F.TCP_CTR_F_ID = D.TCP_CTR_F_ID AND F.STATE = 'A' left join main_data E on F.NODE_TYPE_CONS =E.CEP_CODE AND E.MDT_CD='303' left join main_data G on G.CEP_CODE=F.NODE_NUMBER_CONS AND G.MDT_CD='301' where D.REQ_RSP='RSP' AND A.API_ID=#value# and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and E.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and F.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and G.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND F.node_type = '2' ORDER BY F.NODE_DESC_ID

SELECT D.XSD_DEMO REQINSTANCE FROM api A,service B,contract_version C,contract_format D WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = D.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND A.API_ID=#value# AND D.REQ_RSP='RSP' and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT F.XSD_DEMO REQINSTANCE FROM api A,service B,contract_version C,contract_format D,service_product_real E,prod_xsd_demo F WHERE A.SERVICE_ID=B.SERVICE_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND B.service_id = E.SERVICE_ID AND E.PRODUCT_ID = F.PRODUCT_ID AND D.TCP_CTR_F_ID = F.TCP_CTR_F_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = D.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND E.PRODUCT_ID = #value# AND D.REQ_RSP='RSP' and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and C.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# AND F.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT TYPE_ID TYPEID, CODE CODE, NAME NAME, DESCRIPTOR DESCRIPTOR FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT F.NEVL_CONS_VALUE FROM api A, service B, contract_version C, contract_format D, contract E, node_desc F WHERE A.SERVICE_ID = B.SERVICE_ID AND C.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID = B.CONTRACT_VERSION_ID AND E.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID AND F.TCP_CTR_F_ID = D.TCP_CTR_F_ID AND C.contract_version_id = D.contract_version_id AND A.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND D.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND E.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND F.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND D.REQ_RSP = 'RSP' AND F.NEVL_CONS_TYPE = 4 AND A.API_ID = #value# ) aa, exception_type bb WHERE bb.code_soure_id = aa.NEVL_CONS_VALUE
SELECT A.CEP_CODE CEPCODE,A.MAIND_ID MAINDID, A.CEP_NAME CEPNAME, A.CEP_DES CEPDES FROM main_data A WHERE INSTR(concat(',',#value#,','), concat(',',cep_values,',')) > 0 and TENANT_ID=#tenantId#

SELECT A.DIR_ID DIRID,B.QUE_TITLE QUETITLE,B.QUE_ASK_CONTENT QUEASKCONTENT FROM que_he_dir_list A,ques_help B WHERE A.DIR_ID='601' AND A.QUE_HE_DIR_ID=B.QUE_HELP_ID AND B.QUE_AUDIT_STATE='A' AND (B.QUE_ASK_CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#value#,'%') or B.QUE_TITLE LIKE concat('%',#value#,'%')) and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and B.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
SELECT DIR_NAME DIRNAME FROM directory D WHERE D.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND D.DIR_TYPE = 2 AND D.DIR_ID=#dirId# and D.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select * from org a ,file_share b where a.fil_s_file_id=b.s_file_id and a.isindex='1' and a.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and b.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
select a.name OrgName,b.name ComponentName,b.s_file_id from org a,component b where a.org_id=b.org_id and a.org_id=#orgId# and a.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# and b.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
SELECT COUNT(1) ALLNUM FROM org A where A.ISSUCCESSCASE='1' and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
SELECT A.ORG_ID,A.NAME,A.FIL_S_FILE_ID,A.ORG_USERNAME,A.CAPABILITY FROM org A WHERE A.ISSUCCESSCASE='1' and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId#
SELECT A.ORG_ID,A.NAME,A.FIL_S_FILE_ID,A.ORG_USERNAME,A.CAPABILITY FROM org A where A.ISSUCCESSCASE='1' AND A.ISINDEX = 1 and A.TENANT_ID=#tenantId# limit 0,4

SELECT AA.*, ifnull(BB.PAGE_VIEW,0) PAGE_VIEW, ifnull(BB.COLLECT_CNT,0) COLLECT_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.*,C.DIR_NAME FROM PROD_OFFER A, offer_catalog_location B, `directory` C WHERE A.prod_offer_id = B.prod_offer_id AND B.dir_id = C.dir_id AND A.prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId# AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE = '13' AND A.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND C.DIR_TYPE = '6' AND A.exp_date >= NOW() ) AA LEFT JOIN ITEM_CNT BB ON AA.PROD_OFFER_ID = BB.item_code AND BB.tenant_id = #tenantId# AND BB.item_type=1

SELECT prod_offer_id , prod_offer_name , logo_file_id , fil_s_file_id, fee_desc FROM PROD_OFFER where is_most_popular = 1 and PROD_OFFER.COOPERATION_TYPE = #cooperationType# AND PROD_OFFER.STATUS_CD != '1300' and tenant_id = #tenantId# ORDER BY PROD_OFFER.prod_offer_id DESC limit 0,4
select org_id,name,fil_s_file_id from org a where a.isindex=1 and a.ISSUCCESSCASE =1 order by org_id limit 0,4

select t1.prod_offer_id,count(1) from api_call_cdr_1503 t1 where t1.prod_offer_id in
#prodOfferId[]#
group by t1.prod_offer_id
select count(1) call_cnt from api_call_cdr_$tabSuffix$ t1 where t1.prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId# and t1.tenant_id = #tenantId#
